c1.name: The Theory of Ashâ€”Field Equilibrium
c1.descriptionRaw:
After Aino uses her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11212}Musecatcher{/LINK}</color> or her Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11215}Precision Hydronic Cooler{/LINK}</color>, her Elemental Mastery will be increased by 80. The Elemental Mastery of other nearby active party members will be increased by 80 for 15s.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.
c1.description:
After Aino uses her Elemental Skill **Musecatcher** or her Elemental Burst **Precision Hydronic Cooler**, her Elemental Mastery will be increased by 80. The Elemental Mastery of other nearby active party members will be increased by 80 for 15s.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

c2.name: The Principle of Transference in Gear Differentials
c2.descriptionRaw: If Aino is off-field while the <color=#FFD780FF>Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone</color> of her Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11215}Precision Hydronic Cooler{/LINK}</color> is active, when your active party member hits a nearby opponent with an attack, the <color=#FFD780FF>Cool Your Jets Ducky</color> will fire an additional water ball at that opponent, dealing <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> equal to 25% of Aino's ATK and 100% of her Elemental Mastery. This DMG is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.
c2.description: If Aino is off-field while the Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone of her Elemental Burst **Precision Hydronic Cooler** is active, when your active party member hits a nearby opponent with an attack, the Cool Your Jets Ducky will fire an additional water ball at that opponent, dealing AoE Hydro DMG equal to 25% of Aino's ATK and 100% of her Elemental Mastery. This DMG is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

c3.name: Cake and the Art of Mechanism Repair
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11215}Precision Hydronic Cooler{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of **Precision Hydronic Cooler** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Butter and Cats and the Law of Energy Supply
c4.descriptionRaw: When the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11212}Musecatcher{/LINK}</color> hits an opponent, it will restore 10 Elemental Energy for Aino. Energy can be restored to her in this manner once every 10s.
c4.description: When the Elemental Skill **Musecatcher** hits an opponent, it will restore 10 Elemental Energy for Aino. Energy can be restored to her in this manner once every 10s.

c5.name: Perpetual Turbine of Metal and Light
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11212}Musecatcher{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of **Musecatcher** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Burden of Creative Genius
c6.descriptionRaw:
For the next 15s after using the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11215}Precision Hydronic Cooler{/LINK}</color>, DMG from nearby active characters' Electro-Charged, Bloom, Lunar-Charged, and Lunar-Bloom reactions is increased by 15%.
<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: DMG from the aforementioned reactions will be further increased by 20%.
c6.description:
For the next 15s after using the Elemental Burst **Precision Hydronic Cooler**, DMG from nearby active characters' Electro-Charged, Bloom, Lunar-Charged, and Lunar-Bloom reactions is increased by 15%.
Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: DMG from the aforementioned reactions will be further increased by 20%.
